'''Storm of Defiance''' is [[Venti]]'s Level 6 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*This Constellation is marginally the same as [[Traveler (Anemo)|Anemo Traveler]]'s Level 6 Constellation, [[Intertwined Winds]].

==Trivia==
* The Chinese version uses the same term {{lang|zh=抗争|zh_rm=kàngzhēng|zh_tl=resistance/defiance}} as [[Resistance Books]], talent materials obtained from his ruling nation [[Mondstadt]]. The Japanese, Korean, French, and German localizations retain this association.
